title: Hacked transfered then banned - NEED RIOT STAFF PLZ
body:
recentty my account was hacked , inted and transfered to Turkey from Euw , i messaged the support and gave them every piece of information i had 
- after 3 days they messaged me back , recovered my logins and email but did NOT transfer me back to euw , i had to message them back and post on this forum to  see if they can reverse the transfer . few hours ago they sent back to euw but they gave me a 3 day suspension for int feeding ? got inted while hacked and then transfered , i need a rioter insight please , do i keep messaging them support to get the suspension lifted , or do i just lose my rewards and move on ticket #30908717

replies.body: As long as we can see that the ban was issued during the time of your account being compromised we should be able to help out with that as well. It looks like an agent does currently have your ticket as well, so you should be getting a response very soon!
I would keep messaging them that doesn't seem fair at all
